channel.title: Angry Pkers - Growing already - 20 players on at night times
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.angry-pkers.com/Themes/light_theme_by_SMFSimple/images/logo.png[/img]
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=raD1HrqEEc0[/youtube][/center]
Angry-pkers is based off a Remake of our old Server Lolpks From 2010 That server was a 508 loading 525 We hit 57 players, how ever the Server was so unstable we had to shut it down, it has been down for about 2 years 4 months. Not long ago I thought, why not Remake it using Pi, and so i Started to create it.
Website: [URL=http://angry-pkers.com]Click here[/URL] Forums: [URL=http://angry-pkers.com]Click here[/URL] Webclient: [URL=http://angry-pkers.com/play.php]Click here[/URL] Download: [URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/s/lyf1s6q126grsse/angrypkers.jar]Click here[/URL] [/center]
[center] Angry-pkers is made to Login an pk, but Register before you login, 'cause you have to Have a forums Account to login, All your Kills,Deaths,Boss Kills,ect get inserted to the database, We're 100% pking, but with bosses and a boss token shop. We have 508 maps, almost perfect Combat, Meaning Specials for new items,The Right stats, Same max hits As runescape. [/center]
[center] [img]http://gyazo.com/be36aee4967994aa048b581c5c5bb47b.png?1356022322[/img][img]http://gyazo.com/cf43ef27edaa49daefdaaae3a7c93ef7.png?1356022365[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/3882ea2d452b6b3a4c2c1b6eb5a09871.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/95d5fa60c453efd3802be34c974ea7d3.png?1356021364[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/4886aa05547a9a9f49fd737f6ec79be1.png?1356021444[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/8d2586d532bdc8b5b1e2e5d798a847c6.png[/img] [IMG]http://angry-pkers.com/image/advinpics/thechat.png[/img]
